verbose_text: In this synthesis we juxtapose new findings that were not available at the beginning of the prion era : first, that PrP is a nucleic-acid-binding antimicrobial protein that it similar to retroviral Gag proteins in its ability to trigger reverse transcription; second, that retroelement mobilization is widely seen in TSE disease; and third, that PrP can also mediate nucleic acid transport into and out of the cell.
evidence: PrP can also mediate nucleic acid
